	unsigned int sin_value[42] = {
	160, 156, 152, 148, 144, 140, 136, 132, 128, 
	255, 247, 239, 231, 223, 215, 207, 199, 191,
 	160, 160, 160, 160, 160, 160, 160, 160,
	128, 128, 128, 128, 128, 128, 128, 128,
